decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.Reason: This is required by Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Inspection: Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment: The works proposed are acceptable and will not have an adverse effect on the trees or reduce their amenity value. Recommendation: Approve tree surgery work.

Please revise the householder validation check list with updated information. Please check the new local list in our website before filling the householder validation checklist.The new local list and validation checklists can be obtained via the council's website- https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/download/261/validation-requirements-for-planning-applications.
